org.aavso.tools.vstar.ui.dialog
Class StarGroupSelectionPane

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.aavso.tools.vstar.ui.dialog.StarGroupSelectionPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class StarGroupSelectionPane
extends javax.swing.JPanel

This class represents a widget that permits a star group to be selected from a pop-up list and a star in that group from another pop-up list.

See Also:
Serialized Form
